name: Cpp-phone
tagline: A console based Software which have different features of a Phone.  Entirely coded in C++. The Graphical inteface is built on SFML.
body:
# Cpp-Phone
A console based Software which have different features of a Phone.  Entirely coded in C++. The Graphical inteface is built on SFML. 


Cpp-Phone
------------------------

*Synopsis*

This is a console based Phone software. The entire software is written in C++. For graphical interface SFML has been used. After you unpack the sofware the following directories are found:


[Code](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/tree/master/Code)

[Documentation](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/tree/master/Documentation)

[SFML](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/tree/master/SFML)

In the [Code](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/tree/master/Code) subfolder the following header files are found:

-[Calculator.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/Calculator.h)

-[error.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/error.h)

-[Methods.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/Methods.h)

-[Options.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/Options.h)

-[Person.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/Person.h)

-[Phone.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/Phone.h)

-[PhoneBook.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/PhoneBook.h)

-[PhoneCall.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/PhoneCall.h)

-[RegisterPerson.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/RegisterPerson.h)

-[SFML.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/SFML.h)

-[SMS.h](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/blob/master/Code/SMS.h)

Besides C++ Standard Library is extensively used. For more on each files please see the documentation.
The [Documentation](https://github.com/abrarShariar/Cpp-Phone/tree/master/Documentation) folder containes all the necessary doc files in .html format
The "SFML" folder contains the SFML library (version 2.1)


*Compilation*

In order to use the C++Phone you must compile the main.cpp file included in the "Code" sub-folder. 

NOTE: You must read the followings (included in the documentation) properly before compiling the software:

	1) How to set up SFML

	2) How to run the sofware 

	3) How it works
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
